title: The J Squad and Lil Monte
description:
It's Extra Bailiff Day with Summertime Fun Time Bailiff Monte Belmonte! In the winter! Monte joins Judge Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse in chambers to discuss mini golf, joke origins, winter layering, local TV stations, child names, and the return of the hit segment DRACULA OR NO!

LINKS DISCUSSED IN THIS EPISODE:

  • Spicy Pony Head by Kasper Hauser
  • Dogsledder Blair Braverman's Twitter thread about suiting up for Winter weather
  • Dana Hersey of Channel 38's The Movie Loft
  • KOFY TV 20 San Francisco (stereo!)
  • Monte's Bed-In for Cancer Connection: bit.ly/inbedwithmonte
  • Listen to Monte's podcast A Week of Mornings!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (John Hodgman, Jesse Thorn)
